Articles.Content: Last night, I send three Kerbals back home from the Mun. The capsule landed in the ocean and I thought it would be cool if I could recover them. I tried to build a chopper with the B9 mod pack, but that killed more Kerbals then I lost during my whole spaceprogram:huh:. I was wondering if any of you guys ever tried this and what vehicle you used to recover landed Kerbals.

Airship + KAS - it's a bit slow but you can pick quite large ships up, and give your heroes a comfortable ride home too. Hardest part is making it stop.

KAS can winch up Kerbals on their own if that's all you want, too.

Edited May 13, 2013 by Van Disaster

Make a boat dude. I got Jeb stuck on the other side of the planet (on land) so I'm gonna look at a VTOL aircraft to get him back to KSC when I get the time.

Good luck.

G.
A boat might be the easiest solution but I must say I realy like the airship Good job!
